letters.description: Creating a safe and empathetic environment for the client to share their trauma experience.
Exploring the impact of trauma on the client and providing psychoeducation about trauma recovery.
Assessing trauma-related symptoms and acknowledging the client's strengths and resilience.
Reframing negative thought patterns and teaching emotional regulation skills to manage distress.
Supporting the client in integrating their trauma experience and building a fulfilling life beyond survival.
